ARTICLE.TITLE: Kubis visits Rahi, underlines need for implementing major reforms
ARTICLE.TEXT:
NNA - Maronite Patriarch, Cardinal Bechara Boutros Rahi, on Friday received in Bkerke the United Nations Special Coordinator for Lebanon, Jan Kubis.

After the meeting, Kubis stressed the need for Lebanon to start major reforms so that it regains the confidence of the international community, which will in turn provide aid for reconstruction.

The UN official added that they also dwelt on long-term reconstruction aid, expecting from the Lebanese officials and the government to start implementing reforms.

============== L.Y
